segments.text: Hello Mike ! Would you like a drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you . I had too much to drink yesterday evening . I had a bad hangover this morning . My head felt terrible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It was a friend ’ s birthday party . We drank all kinds of things-beer , wine and spirits . After midnight , we were even drinking cocktails !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a bad idea to drink a combination of alcoholic drinks . You should stick with one for the whole evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but it was a celebration , you Kwon ? I don ’ t think I ’ Ve see you drunk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I usually only drink beer and I rarely drink more than a few pints .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are a sensible drinker . Anyway , I ’ m not going to drink any alcohol this evening . I don ’ t ’ want another bad hangover .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me buy you a soft drink then . How about a coke ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . That ’ s a good idea . I heard that coke was first used as a medicine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Rally ? ... barman ! ... a large coke with ice and lemon , please ... thanks . Here ’ s the money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to the wine tasting tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I thought it might be interesting to learn a little about wine ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ... and taste a few ! There will be wines from several countries and an expert to give advice on which wines are good and which ones are not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I ’ m looking forward to it .
segments.speaker: S1
